data.title: Service and food is alright
data.text: I've had better in LA county area but it's the best I've had so far up here.. I wish it was a little spicier in their sauces though. Overall I will be coming back

data.title: Service could be Improved and Food is Good (Seafood)
data.text:
During a work related lunch I was introduced to this place. It's good. The food is tasty. My absolute biggest problem is that they do not de-vein the shrimp ( since of course they're precooked) I also offered the waitress extra money to have my shrimp cleaned properly her answer was, "No".  I do love their salsa and their shrimp empanadas are killer great fish tostadas. This was my regular spot for shrimp cocktails ( I've recently found an excellent spot, another review ) This place is also no alcohol. 

A huge setback is the staff . The gals are not polite you almost feel like they're being bothered when you ask them for a straw !! If you want a refill or extra lemons be prepared for the huffing and puffing.

 Also a very clean place.

data.title: Mala comida, mala atencion
data.text: Definitivamente no merece la pena este restaurante! Por el poco personal se da un mal servicio, la comida no es nada que valga la pena! Pedí una sopa de mariscos y no me gusto el sabor ni la presentación. El lugar es feo
